title: under the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to Joe O’Brien,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Rural and Community Development
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Rural and Community Development 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited rural community development (delegation ministerial functions) order 2023

title: under the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to Joe O’Brien,
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Rural and Community Development conferred on her by or 
under the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to Joe O’Brien, 
Minister of State at the Department of Rural and Community Development 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [68] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister rural community development conferred enactment specified schedule delegated joe brien minister state department rural community development notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 17th february 2023 68 3

title: under the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to Joe O’Brien,
heading: Educational Endowments (Ireland) Act 1885 (48 & 49 Vict. c. 78)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Educational Endowments (Ireland) Act 1885 (48 & 49 Vict. c. 78) 

Charities Act 1961 (No. 17 of 1961) 

Street and House to House Collections Act 1962 (No. 13 of 1962) 

Dormant Accounts Act 2001 (No. 32 of 2001) 

Unclaimed Life Assurance Policies Act 2003 (No. 2 of 2003) 

Charities Act 2009 (No. 6 of 2009) (other than section 13 of that Act) 

Dormant Accounts (Amendment) Act 2012 (No. 23 of 2012) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

14 February, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [68]
